item.title: Fairly Useless, a new blog for tech geeks
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I've got a buddy who's started his first blog, Fairly Useless. It's mostly tech related, and there are only a few articles, but what he's got so far are great reads. His latest is an article on Pocket Mods.
item.excerpt:encoded: I've got a buddy who's started his first blog, Fairly Useless. It's mostly tech related, and there are only a few articles, but what he's got so far are great reads. His latest is an article on Pocket Mods.
